name.en: Seminar on Auditing Theory and Applications

goal.en: "Provide students with a general understanding of auditing research and practice in the last several decades. The theories, research methodologies, and empirical findings underlying this area of studies will be illustrated. In addition, this course will discuss the role and implications of the auditing research for auditing practice."
